The shirt was a little larger than I thought but figured to would shrink some..did a little bit does seem for this particular style of the 100 cotton that is runs bigger than their blended shirts..that said the quality is really nice and is fairly heavy cotton for a tee-shirt. I got it during the summer but just now wearing it in the fall as found it a little hot previously. That said if you want a really nice quality cotton tee with the champion logo on it worn for comfort and style I would recommend this one. If you want a T-shirt that breaths more for activities then go for one of the blended shirts as they are much thinner.
